summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2555, for the improvement of East 70th Street and East 68th Street, from 10th Avenue Northeast to east line of James Division of Green Lake Addition, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and side walking the same, and providing for the necessary surface and sub-surface drainage, provided that East 69th Street and East 70th Street, be improved by center parking strips of suitable width; under Ordinance No. 29642 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
